definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: become faint, languish (NH id. Hiph.; cf. Ar. gasasa: toil, weary oneself; v. also [[דְּאָבָה]], [[דְּאָבוֹן]] & cf. [[דוב]])—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[דָּֽאֲבָה]] Ps 88:10 (subj. [[עַיִן]]); Inf. [[לְדַאֲבָה]] Je 31:12 ´[[לאׁ יוֹסִיפוּ לְד]] (subj. ransomed Israel);—Je 31:25 has [[נֶפֶשׁ דָּֽאֲבָה]], of hunger (‖[[נֶפֶשׁ עֲיֵפָָה]]), where adj. or pt. seems needed; Hi Gf [[דְּאֵבָה]] or [[דּׂאֲבָה]] (the punctuators had, acc. to them, the Aram. participle in mind); Thes. makes relative clause.
